Пока не поправят баги с ударом маньяк через текстуры, на 2м+, баланс перок. Не вижу смысла играть в это. Куча реальных примеров, когда маньяк играет как отсталый аутист, но вытаскивает игру под конец за счёт ваншот перок, когда сделаны все генераторы. Или как Аня через текстуры кидает топором и вначале игры кладёт людей на пол с броска топора. Этот список можно бесконечно продолжать. Полная тупость, а не механика с балансом. Разрабы, вводите тогда имбовые перки выжившим, что бы генератор за 10+- секунд делать со старта. Или имуны прожимные на 10сек+- хотя бы. Что бы выжившим выйти с карты, нужно очень сильно постараться. Что бы маньяку повесить хотя бы 2их, надо лицом об клаву постучаться пару раз.

데바데 하면서 매튜에게 하고 싶은 말들
매튜야 아니 자기야 매칭 시스템이 말이 아니야 자기야 어떻게 된거야 핵도 너무 많고 나 정신 나갈버릴 거 같아 자기야 그리고 밸런스도 말이 전혀 안되잖아 자기야 제발 자기야 일 좀 해줘 자기야 부탁할게 마지막으로 자기야 mmr 시스템 도대체 왜 만든거야 자기야? 실감이 안되는 거 같아 자기야 차라리 그거 만들 시간에 밸런스 패치에 좀 더 힘을 써줬으면 좋을 거 같아 자기야 그리고 자기야 이번에 그거 링이랑 합작하잖아 이번에도 너스블 꼴 나면 나 진짜 엄청 화날 거 같아 그니까 처음부터 사기로 만들어 너프 먹일빠엔 그냥 처음부터 생각 좀 해서 만들어 줬으면 좋겠어 자기야 데바데가 점점 망겜의 길을 걷는 같아 그니까 놀지말고 일이나 해 제발 매튜야 자기야 오늘 게임하면서 살인마 애들이 자주 팅기는 현상이 있더라 자기야 일하자^^ 그리고 이번에 나오는 사다코는 너스블처럼 너무 사기적으로 만들지말고 처음부터 생각을 좀 첨가해서 만들어줬으면 좋겠어 메튜야 그리고 킬률 그거 북미섭을 기준으로 잡지말고 전체서버로 쫌 통계학적으로 뭔 느낌인지 알지? 아니 그리고 그 메튜야 봐봐 자 힐빌리와 블라이트와 군단이 있어 그치? 자 셋다 어떻게 보면은 다 달리는 능력이다 그치? 근데 여기서 중요한 점은 블라이트는 이제 도핑을 하고 뛰는거니까 내가 이해는 해줄께 근데 어떻게 톱들고 달리는 애가 단검을 들고 뛰는 애보다 빠를 수 있을까? 물리학적으로 이해가 안되네 ㅎㅎ 그니까 좀 패치해
매튜야 내가 새해에 데바데를 하고 있는데 또 핵이 나오네^^ 하핳 그냥 그렇다고 이제 새해가 밝았으니까 이제 너도 핵을 좀 더 열심히 잡아줬으면 좋겠어 너가 벤을 좀 제대로 해준다면 우리 모두가 행복하게 데바데를 할 수 있지 않을까? 그리고 랜뽑하는 인간들도 좀 제재 좀 해주라 내가 너 아끼는 알지?^^

конченая игра в которую я вообще когда то играл, играешь первые 2-3 гена все норм, но если ты замансишь мана, то этот утырок повесит тебя на крюк и будет стоять фейс кемпит в эбало, если у вас много времени и вы мазахист, то эта конченая игра для вас

bockt schon hart wenn man sich erstmal mit allen Maps und Perks auseinander gesetzt hat. ein wenig nervig ist der endlos lange bloodpoint grid am Anfang aber selbst das geht wenn man nicht immer schnell stirbt. selbst dlcs muss man nicht umbedingt kaufen um alles zu bekommen außer lizenzierte Charaktere. etwas nervig sind manchmal toxic endgame Chats aber das ist ja leider heutzutage normal. im großen und ganzen kann man sagen das man mit 4 Leuten zusammen mehr Spaß hat als solo rein zu suchten.

офигенная игра,мы играем за одного четкого из ребят вы с компашкой друганов влазите на ферму,школу,свалку,или другую территорию тырить яблоки,книги,или просто насрать под дверь местному сторожу алкашу, но чтоб вылезти надо включить генераторы и дать питание на рубильник чтоб открыть ворота а генераторы не работают потому что сторожу алкашу они мешают спать как и вы по этому он ходить и херячит генераторы ногой а вас так вообще всем что под руки попадет будь то мачете старый ржавый нож бензопила а если сторож баба и перепила так вообще заблюёт и благо если блевать будет желчью а если у неё ещё и туберкулёз вообще кровью будет харкать в вас и наносить вам значительный урон так как у вас нет прививки от ковид и всё готовь бабки на лекарства или же вы можете играть за сторожа алкаша тогда ваша цель четверо мамкиных чепушил которые влезли на вашу ферму за яблоками дать по хрепту тем что попадётся под руки и садить их на бутылку после 3 раза как вы посадите чела на бутылку он расплачется и мамка заберёт его домой если всех четверых мамка заберёт домой то вы сможете продолжить квасить и выспаться спокойно

이 게임을 생존자로 즐기는 것은 어느정도 인류애를 지킬 수 있읍니다. 

가끔 이기주의의 극치를 달리는 몇몇 플레이어들이 있긴하지만, 다 같이 살아서 나가는 것이 의무적인 행동은 아니니 참작이 가능합니다.

그러나 이 게임을 살인마로 플레이 할 의향이 있다면, 각종 생존자 고인물들의 놀림과 모욕을 들으며 플레이해야합니다. 20랭크 시절부터 생존자한테 콩글리시 + 한글리시로 각종 욕설과 모독성 언행을 듣기도 하였으며, 각종 티배깅은 기본... 실력 없으면 울어야합니다. 실력이 잡혀도 4인큐면 파훼하려면 더욱 많은 실력을 필요로 합니다.

재밌지만... ....하....이게 게임이냐

The devs are apparently 12 year olds, running profanity filters but not doing anything about blatant cheating. The game heavily favors the killer (ie. significantly faster, freight train hitboxes, stupid moves that can knock you down from a mile away) so although survivors have the ability to "wiggle" out of the killer's clutches, with hooks around every corner it's a virtually useless tool. I'd say one out of every ten games played will be one against a bot that is just there to farm blood points, and even then be prepared to get paired up with a survivor who hides in a locker the whole game. I am honestly astounded that I even gave this game 1 hour, with 35 other hours giving the benefit of the doubt. 

If you liked this review, make sure you smash that like and subscribe button and don't forget about today's sponsors, use discount code "GitFucked" for an additional 15% of wasted time on this game.

Wenn man mit Dead by Daylight anfängt, ist das Spiel die pure Liebe. Es ist aufregend, spannend, man entdeckt immer wieder etwas neues. Es ist gnadenlos aber man lernt stetig etwas dazu.
Natürlich kann es leider nicht immer so bleiben. Das ist selbstverständlich.

Ich persönlich habe vermutlich die meiste Zeit als Surv gespielt, obwohl ich lieber Killer spiele und das liegt an folgendem:
Umso höher man im Rank steigt, desto toxischer wird das Game und da es nunmal ein 4 vs 1 Game ist, wird es besonders als Killer so richtig eklig.

Zu Anfang fühlt man sich als Killer noch mächtig und angsteinflössend. 
Wenn ich inzwischen Killer spiele, fühle ich mich eigtl nur noch wie der Bespaßer in einem Kindergarten, der sich von den Kids alles gefallen lassen muss.
Es wird so richtig abartig: da wird geteabagged was das Zeug hält, mit der Taschenlampe rumgecklickert. Die Survs erheben das förmlich zur Kunstform. Es wird Body geblock und und und. Klar, am Anfang ist das alles noch spaßig und man ignoriert es eine Weile aber irgendwann reisst einem halt die Hutschnur. 
Zur Belohnung, das man das hat über sich ergehen lassen gibt es dann noch ein "gg ez" im Chatt nach der Runde.

Selbst einige großen Streamer mit 6000+ Stunden in DbD ertragen es nur noch, weil sie nunmal davon Leben.

Macht Behaviour da irgendwas? Nicht so richtig und streng genommen wäre es möglich. 

Bodyblocking? Warum werden die Survs nicht einfach zur Zeit verschoben, wenn der Killer durch sie durchläuft? Warum kann ein Schwinger nicht gleich mehrere Survs verletzen? 
Teabaggen? Cooldown, sobald man sich in einer bestimmten Zeit zu oft hingehockt hat?
Wo ist das Problem?
Wenn eine Spielmechanik zum negativen ausgenutzt wird - dann müssen halt alle darunter leiden. So einfach ist das doch eigentlich.

Ich schaue nach wie vor ganz gerne bei DbD zu aber selbst spielen?
Normalerweise schaue ich mir neue KIller & Survs mal auf dem PTB an, das wars aber auch schon.

I've been having fun yeah

Just a mess of an unbalanced game, with one of the most painful grinds I've seen, and a community which can get fairly toxic (although that's not everyone, and there's a good side to it). I regret most of my time playing this title, and I only play now when I have friends who want to watch me play killer, or play survivor with me. 

At its best this game can be a fun, challenging fight between a skilled team of survivors and an adept killer. Usually though, it's either you get slammed, or slam the other side. Or encounter cheaters - and not even ones who use cheating to win, just ones that use it to ruin the game. Or you get toxic feedback in the endgame chat. 

Sadly, there are next to no competitors for what Dead by Daylight offers, so if you want an asymmetric horror game, this is the only one with staying power.
人类玩家基数大，所以制作组硬舔，不是所有游戏增加开黑功能都能尽量保持平衡性的，玩屠夫就是花钱去取悦其他四个人而已

I want to recommend this game, I really do. However, as much as I enjoy it, however often I come back, the same problems become more and more prominent. I'm not saying I hate this game, nor that nobody should pick it up, but allow me to be more specific.

Dead by Daylight is a unique genre of game. In it, you play on one of two teams: Either one of four survivors, or a killer. As survivors, you must repair five of seven total generators around the map to power the exit gates, all while evading the killer. If the killer catches you, they will put you on a meat hook. You have three total chances: When you are placed on the hook for the third time, you die. As a killer, your job is to delay the generators' repair while trying to catch, hook, and kill as many survivors as possible. There are some games that use this same formula: Identity V, VHS, and Home Sweet Home: Survive, primarily. 

Out of all of these, only Dead by Daylight has the excessive amount of licensed killers and survivors - sadly, Netflix is now making their own Stranger Things games, and they declined to continue that license, so if you encounter a Steve Harrington, Nancy Wheeler, or Demogorgon, they are no longer available to purchase for players that didn't have it before. 

The game is fun at its base, but it does show the extent to which the gameplay is limited. Every killer has one of a few types of powers. Primarily: Gather information, damage from afar, get close really fast, or become undetected. Some of them, like the Nurse, can ignore obstacles entirely. The gameplay is fun, can be exciting, and can be frustrating. My largest problems with it come not from the game itself but the pattern that the developers have established.

Behaviour has a reputation of ignoring problems and pushing buggy patches. One relevant example is that Dead by Daylight had been out for over four years before implementing colorblindness settings - releasing a statement on them only after receiving backlash from a developer getting annoyed at people asking about colorblind modes. 

Many of their perks are incredibly mediocre to the point where you may not use it, even if it were equipped for multiple games. However, their best perks are used constantly and nigh-oppressive. I fear that the game may continue to stale. Certain maps are sided towards one team or another - indoor maps in particular are hell for many killers. If I could trust Behavior to make changes often and effective, this would be less of a problem - but I cannot truthfully say that.

I don't immediately recommend this game. However, if you are interested, I would recommend watching some of Otzdarva's videos - the sub-20 minute ones, not the 16 hour all perk tier list - and moving from there. The game can be some of the most fun I've had, and I wish for it to continue, but the developers NEED to start making more drastic changes for it to continue to last and improve. I want the game to improve because I enjoy it. I will continue updating my review if anything of note happens as well, but as of December 2021, this is my review.

EDIT: As of May 2022, I have picked the game up again for some casual play, and I am enjoying it. Devs have announced a couple perk reworks and plenty of QoL changes. All of my prior criticisms still stand (except the Netflix thing - BHVR couldn't control that at all). The game is fun tho so like go on ahead
